description:
"Reimu Hakurei Music Pack" is now available as the 4th character pack !
This time, it is a pack that only collects arranged songs of Reimu's theme songs. In addition to the popular song, it also comes with a special name plate and cute pixel art emblem badge inspired by Reimu !

This pack contains the following:

■6 Songs
・Drops of Misery / Yuuhei Satellite
・Shoujo kyuseiron / Akatsuki Records
・Wanna Be My Dream / A-One
・PRISM / Hatsunetsumiko's
・Don't forget Days / TUMENECO & GET IN THE RING
・Hakurei Jinja Chonaikai Ondo / IOSYS

■1 Nameplate / 1 Emblem Badge

■6 Challenge Stages
・Lv.5 What are you saying even though you're a professional? (Don't forget Days)
・Lv.6 Festival showdown (Hakurei Jinja Chonaikai Ondo)
・Lv.7 Fight now! (Shoujo kyuseiron)
・Lv.8 You and (Drops of Misery)
・Lv.9 Turns into a rainbow (PRISM)
・Lv.10 Much more (Wanna Be My Dream)

* Internet connection required for purchase.
* Game must be restarted after songs are purchased in order to use them.
name: Reimu Hakurei Music Pack
